title: Starts ranked game, game crashes, 800mb update to re-access client

replies.body:
Hey there,

Seems like you had a few corrupt files in your installation. After the patch let me know if the issues persist so we can explore other avenues as to the cause of this problem.
Update: Seems to have fixed itself...I can play customs without crashing but I have 5 que timers now
Good to hear, I would still recommend running a client repair just to be safe.
Game is still broken....I reconnect at 1:50 into my next game and the client crashes after playing for about 40 seconds, now I cannot reconnect at all and I lose even more LP :)

Do you run lolreplay or any third party tools for league? if so, close them and try to play a custom game to see if the issue is resolved.

Could you try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) and let me know how it goes
I've closed all 3rd party software for league of legends and it still crashes in loading screen ;-;

As stated above, could you try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) (This will take a while) and let me know if that helps.

http://prntscr.com/a1a5dg

I want my LP back....
